page.title: 07Brownie Pack, Burgess Hill
page.content: The Brownies were founded in 1910 by Lord Baden Powell. When girls are 7 years old they can join a group called the Brownies . Our group is called the 8th Burgess Hill (St Andrew's) pack. The pack is divided into small groups called "sixes". These are usually called by Fairy Brownie names. Our sixes are called Gnomes, Elves, Imps and Sprites. Brownies make a promise when they get enrolled. The promise is, "I promise that I'll do my best to do my duty to God, to serve the Queen and help other people and to keep the Brownie Guide law." The law is, "A Brownie guide thinks of others before herself and does a good turn every day". In our country we wear a brown dress with a yellow tie and a brown woollen hat. This year Brownies are celebrating the 75 anniversary.
